page.title: 09SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY.
page.content: TO MAKE BANKING EASY LLOYD'S HAVE A CASHPOINT MACHINE FOR WHICH YOU HAVE GOT TO HAVE A SPECIAL CARD.IT HAS A MAG NETIC STRIP WHICH IS READ BY SENSORS LIKE A TAPE RECORDER.THE MAIN COMPUTERS IN BIRMINGHAM ARE LINKED TO THE MAIN ONE IN LONDON BUT LLOYD'S IS BEING MOVED TO PETERBOROOUGH.THERE ARE SYST- EMS IN LLOYD'S TO PREVENT BURGLARIES SUCH AS LINKED BLOCKS,SPY HOLES,2 DIFF ERENT NUMBERS TO OPEN DOORS & SAFES WITH 2 SETS OF KEYS.THE HALIFAX BUILD ING SOCIETY HAVE SILENT ALARMS ENABLING THE POLICE TO BE ALERTED IN THE CASE OF A BURGLARY.THE COMPUTER UPSTAIR STORES ALL THE INFORMATION ON THE HALIFAX CASH POINT MACHINE AT WHICH YOU CAN WITHDRAW YOUR MONEY.YOU HAVE TO BE 18 OR OVER TO HAVE A CASHCARD.
